The YellowFeverDynamics package is a supplement to the [YEP package](https://mrc-ide.github.io/YEP/index.html), used for running alternate versions of the standard SEIRV yellow fever transmission model contained in that package, and [TBA].

Please see the documentation for YEP for details of the standard model and functions contained in that package.
